attributes.action: Stop charging VAT on fuel for road tax exempt disbled vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All essential equipment purchased for use by disabled persons are exempt from VAT. Vehicles which are purchased for the use by Disabled persons such as Motorbility and wheel chair converted vehicles are exempt from VAT when purchased. These vehicles are also exempt from road tax.
However VAT is still charged on fuel for these vehicles.
In the case of disability vehicles, these are not a luxury, they are  essential. Charging VAT on fuel for such vehicles is equivelent to levying a 'walking tax' on the non-disabled.
